DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the impact of telemedicine system in rural hospitals for diagnosis and treatment of Diabetes retinopathy and Diabetes macular edema.
DOC.brief_title: Uptake of Telemedicine System Trial in Rual Canton
DOC.detailed_description: Telemedicine system mainly contains a comprehensive eye examination electric-records (E-record), which can transfer the fundus pictures from rural hospitals to professional Graders (golden standard for a diagnose of Diabetes Retinopathy (DR) and Diabetes Macular Edema(DME)). In Zhongshan Ophthalmic Center (ZOC). By this system, the investigators can evaluate the capacity of rural eye doctors about the diagnosis of DR/DME, and give proper suggestions for the treatment and revisit plan.
DOC.criteria: age > 40y, diagnosed (Diabetes Retinopathy) DR,10% normal patients unconsciousness, history of diabetic ketoacidosis, cardiac insufficiency, Severe atrioventricular block, hepatic insufficiency , allergic to mydriatic
